FIELD_DESC: Unique Carrier Code. When the same code has been used by multiple carriers, a numeric suffix is used for earlier users, for example, PA, PA(1), PA(2). Use this field for analysis across a range of years.
Elapsed Time of Flight, in Minutes
National Air System Delay, in Minutes
Diverted Flight Reaching Scheduled Destination Indicator (1=Yes)
Elapsed Time of Diverted Flight Reaching Scheduled Destination, in Minutes.  The ActualElapsedTime column remains NULL for all diverted flights.
